---
Please write in [TARGETLANGUAGE].

Keyword: {{Target Keyword}}
Website: {{Website URL}}
Blog URL: {{Blog URL}}
Location: Bengaluru
Platform/Tool: {{Blog Platform}}

[PROMPT]

Write a fully SEO-optimized blog post with a unique title based on the provided keyword.

Requirements:
- Content must be 100% unique every time
- Follow the rules/format of the selected blog platform
- Include FAQs
- Include tables where useful
- Include one poll question
- Add a contact line at the end
- Do NOT give one-line descriptions
- Do NOT repeat or reuse content from previous responses
PromptHint: Enter your Target Keyword, Website URL, Blog URL, and platform (WordPress, Blogger, Medium, etc.)
